summary: A man who escapes from the vicious grips of the serial killer known as "The Collector" is then forced to help rescue an innocent girl from the killer's booby-trapped lair.
cast: Josh Stewart|Emma Fitzpatrick|Christopher McDonald|Lee Tergesen|Tim Griffin|Andre Royo|Randall Archer|Shannon Kane|Brandon Molale|Erin Way|Johanna Braddy|Michael Nardelli|Will Peltz|Daniel Sharman|Justin Mortelliti|Navi Rawat|Courtney Lauren Cummings|Laura Marion|Joshua Burion-Mohr|Michael H. Cole|Heather Mote|Anne Tyler|Tandra Caldwell|Ryan Cutrona|Anne Marie Howard|Mel Fair|John Gulager|Seth Camillo|Jeff Arbaugh|Brett Forbes|Jennifer Hilton Monroe|Robert Pralgo|Patrick Rizzotti|Brita Parker|David Landsness|David Karlak|Elizabeth Davidovich|David Fritsch|Barry Guy|Kelso Harvin|Brian Hite|Tracy Kay|Eaddy Mays|Jilian McLendon|Tabatha Minchew|Tony Phillips|Valeri Rogers|Liz Smallwood|Jacob Yakob
title: The Collection
